name: Rhythm Smithy
description:
A rhythm game where you create tools and weapons by hitting proper rhythmical patterns.

Made for Miz Jam 1. I joined much later and was able to spend only 24 hours instead of given 48.

Note on the state of the game

The project is in prototype state: it's polished so you can play, but it lacks content. The game text might have some typos, the interface needs more adjustment. Anyway you will be able to test out the idea.
